attribute.value: select distinct lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb order by lbdh

select key ,value from (select khzbdh as key, khzbmc as value from khfa_khzb_hy union all select distinct zbpz.khzbdh key ,zbpz.xmmc value from khfa_fapz fapz, khfa_khzbpz zbpz where fapz.yyzlbh = 1 and zbpz.khzbdh < 0 and fapz.fabh = zbpz.fabh ) t order by key

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select t.zb,t.nf,t.yf,t.lbdh,t.lbmc,t.khzbdh,t.khzbmc,t.jxgz,$qsrq$ as qsrq,$jsrq$ as jsrq from ( select case when sum(t.jxgz) over(partition by t.yf)=0 then 0 else round(t.jxgz*100.00/sum(t.jxgz) over(partition by t.yf),2) end as zb, t.nf,t.yf,t.lbdh,t.lbmc,t.khzbdh,t.khzbmc,t.jxgz from (
select tjrq,nf,yf,lbdh,lbmc,khzbdh,khzbmc,sum(yyjg) as jxgz from ( select sjw.tjrq, floor(sjw.tjrq/10000) as nf,f_numtochar(floor(mod(sjw.tjrq,10000)/100))||'月份' as yf, lb.lbdh,lb.lbmc,khzb.khzbdh, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc , yy.yyjg from ( select distinct case when ym<$sysdate$ then ym else $sysdate$ end as tjrq from csb_sjw sjw where ym=tjrq and sjw.tjrq between $qsrq_ym$ and $jsrq_ym$ ) sjw inner join khfa_yyjg_hy yy on yy.tjrq = sjw.tjrq inner join khdx_hylb lb on lb.khdxdh = yy.khdxdh and $jsrq_ym$ between lb.qsrq and lb.jsrq left join ( select khzbdh, khzbmc from khfa_khzb_hy union all select distinct zbpz.khzbdh ,zbpz.xmmc as khzbmc from khfa_fapz fapz, khfa_khzbpz zbpz where fapz.yyzlbh = 1 and zbpz.khzbdh < 0 and fapz.fabh = zbpz.fabh ) khzb on khzb.khzbdh = yy.khzbdh
inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on yy.fabh = zbpz.fabh and yy.khzbdh = zbpz.khzbdh where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yy.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) ) xx
group by tjrq,nf,yf,lbdh,lbmc,khzbdh,khzbmc order by lbdh,khzbdh ) t
where 1=1 and t.lbdh = '$hylb$' and t.khzbdh = $khzb$ union all
select case when sum(t.jxgz) over(partition by t.nf)=0 then 0 else round(t.jxgz*100.00/sum(t.jxgz) over(partition by t.nf),2) end as zb, t.nf,t.yf,t.lbdh,t.lbmc,t.khzbdh,t.khzbmc,t.jxgz from (
select cast(null as decimal(19,3)) zb,t.nf,'月份合计' yf,t.lbdh,t.lbmc,t.khzbdh,t.khzbmc,sum(t.jxgz) jxgz from ( select case when sum(t.jxgz) over(partition by t.yf)=0 then 0 else round(t.jxgz*100.00/sum(t.jxgz) over(partition by t.yf),2) end as zb, t.nf,t.yf,t.lbdh,t.lbmc,t.khzbdh,t.khzbmc,t.jxgz from (
select tjrq,nf,yf,lbdh,lbmc,khzbdh,khzbmc,sum(yyjg) as jxgz from ( select sjw.tjrq, floor(sjw.tjrq/10000) as nf,f_numtochar(floor(mod(sjw.tjrq,10000)/100))||'月份' as yf, lb.lbdh,lb.lbmc,khzb.khzbdh, case when khzb.khzbmc is null then zbpz.xmmc else khzb.khzbmc end as khzbmc , yy.yyjg from ( select distinct case when ym<$sysdate$ then ym else $sysdate$ end as tjrq from csb_sjw sjw where ym=tjrq and sjw.tjrq between $qsrq_ym$ and $jsrq_ym$ ) sjw inner join khfa_yyjg_hy yy on yy.tjrq = sjw.tjrq inner join khdx_hylb lb on lb.khdxdh = yy.khdxdh and $jsrq_ym$ between lb.qsrq and lb.jsrq left join ( select khzbdh, khzbmc from khfa_khzb_hy union all select distinct zbpz.khzbdh ,zbpz.xmmc as khzbmc from khfa_fapz fapz, khfa_khzbpz zbpz where fapz.yyzlbh = 1 and zbpz.khzbdh < 0 and fapz.fabh = zbpz.fabh ) khzb on khzb.khzbdh = yy.khzbdh
inner join khfa_khzbpz zbpz on yy.fabh = zbpz.fabh and yy.khzbdh = zbpz.khzbdh where exists(select 1 from khfa_fapz pz where yy.fabh=pz.fabh and pz.yyzlbh=1) ) xx
group by tjrq,nf,yf,lbdh,lbmc,khzbdh,khzbmc order by lbdh,khzbdh ) t
where 1=1 and t.lbdh = '$hylb$' and t.khzbdh = $khzb$ ) t group by t.nf,t.lbdh,t.lbmc,t.khzbdh,t.khzbmc ) t ) t order by t.yf
